name: Angry Deliveries
description:
A clone of the game Stack Colors! I made in 7 days as a test for a job interview.

Drag your finger on the screen to drive the cart.
Drive on the parcels with your same color to collect them.

As you approach the finish line, tap quickly to charge power and kick the parcels to shoot them as far as you can.
The more you collected and the further they reach, the more coins you get.

Use the coins to buy upgrade before each level.
